name: .RDL File Extension
summary: Learn about .RDL files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Vector-based drawing format used by Bentley Microstation; saved as a "reference attachment" and is displayed with an active model, such as a .DGN or .DWG file; used for plotting or construction purposes.

content: RDL files typically have a similar name as the corresponding model they reference and should be saved in the same folder.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
